title: Pinterest Clon
description: We carried out a project in React, a visual clone of Pinterest using the 'Masonry' component from Material UI, as well as the infinite scroll package, the 'unsplash' image repository, and finally 'zustand' for global states.

title: Expense Tracker
description: We completed a project in React where we utilized the React Context API, LocalStorage, as well as Tailwind CSS and Victory modules for web interfaces.
